CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_1__c ) ,"", '£' & TEXT(Hourly_rate_timeslot_1__c * Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_1__c)&BR() )& IF( ISBLANK( Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_2__c ) ,"", '£' & TEXT(Hourly_rate_timeslot_2__c * Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_2__c)&BR() )& IF( ISBLANK(Fixed_price_charge__c ) ,"", '£' & TEXT(Fixed_price_charge__c) &BR() )
CustomField.label: NEW Labour charges formula
